page.title: 15 Barham.Sport and Leisure.
page.content: Barham has many sports facilities.There are tennis courts down Brickfield Lane and a football pitch on the village green.The bowling green is next to the village hall.Badminton is played inside the village hall. There is a cricket pitch over the road from the tennis courts.At Lydden there is a race circuit where you can see car bangers and motor cycles,hot rods and go-carts.The closest swimming pool is in Canterbury.There are many Clubs and Societies in Barham. The Youth Club meet at the Village Hall.There is a Wives Club which meets at different peoples' houses.The Barham Society is concerned with the preservation of the village. The W.I.has written an interesting History of Barham.The last production of the village Drama Group was The Real Inspector Hound by Tom Stoppard.
